name: sommos
description: Yacht Sommelier Operating System - Offline-first wine management PWA

scripts.clean: rm -rf playwright-report test-results test-results.json coverage node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:db
scripts.fresh: npm run clean:all && npm run setup:db && npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.check:git: git status --short | grep -E '_REPORT|_SUMMARY|_COMPLETE|test-results|playwright-report' || echo 'âœ… No temporary files staged'
scripts.setup:db:clean: rm -f ./data/sommos.db && npm run setup:db && npm run migrate && npm run seed && node backend/database/seed-guest-codes.js
scripts.seed: npm run seed:lookups && npm run seed:users && npm run seed:data
scripts.test:flaky: for i in 1 2 3 4 5; do npm test -- --json --outputFile=jest-run-$i.json --silent || true; done && node scripts/analyze-flakiness.js jest-run-*.json --format jest
scripts.test:e2e:flaky: for i in 1 2 3; do npx playwright test --reporter=json --output=playwright-run-$i.json || true; done && node scripts/analyze-flakiness.js playwright-run-*.json --format playwright
scripts.test:flaky:quick: for i in 1 2 3; do npm test -- tests/backend --json --outputFile=jest-quick-$i.json --silent || true; done && node scripts/analyze-flakiness.js jest-quick-*.json --format jest

author: SommOS Team
